rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0001
rows.name:
It ain't easy being a former mercenary
leader. People are always coming
to me and asking for advice.

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah, you must be the ones who have
taken over old Vandham's position!

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0003
rows.name:
I was a mite worried about
the future of the Hr√¶svelgr
Mercenaries, you know.

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0004
rows.name:
But it looks like you've made a
decent start for yourselves.

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0005
rows.name:
You probably won't have many missions
to take care of to begin with.

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0006
rows.name:
But if you keep doing them at a
steady pace, you'll build up a
reputation for reliability.

rows.label: tlk43500142_03_msg0007
rows.name:
That'll earn you more
missions sooner or later.
